description: This type is used to categorise animals by shared characteristics - so you can say the equivalent of 200 x 2-year-old in-calf Jersey heifers.

name.description: Human-readable name for this inventory grouping.

count.description: The count or number of animals in this inventory classification.

primaryBreed.description: Primary breed defined using an identifier and scheme.

birthPeriod.description: The range of birth dates. Use YYYY (all one year), YYYYMM (one month), or two date-times separated by / to represent a range.
